nodes.bodyText: Should it be args or initParameters si that what it does is extra clear? Open subject, really, just asking.
Wouldn't it make more sense for this to be a key-value type arrangement? You can do this by creating a new @ResourceArg annotation with name+value and using an array of annotations.
Yes, that sounds like a good idea. That way only the values need to be deserialized (if not used as strings). The signature of init() could change to init(Map<String, String> args).
That's an excellent idea @stuartwdouglas!  I updated the PR to include it.
I think this should be declared as @Target({}).
Ah darn... I thought I had changed all of those :)
